column4: is there a way to completely remove the "assistive technology" mouse keys?!?! i keep turning it on via my keyboard .. (holding shift a bit) ... (jaunty)
Is the top option switched off in system>prefs.>keyboard>accessibility?
yeh it is ... however. .. if i hold down left shift for a few seconds (3 times in a row) it will switch mousekeys on .. thats even if i am typing something in between the shift pressing ...
